page.title: 12CHURCHES IN BARGEDDIE
page.content: We interviewed the{Rev. Alistair {Malcolm}of{Bartishill Church of {Scotland}and{Father Delaney of {St.Kevin's Roman Catholic Church. We found out that the{Presbyterian {Church}was built in{1876}for the mining communities around it. This church now lies amidst an expanse of {motorways}and{the people of Bargeddie and{Swinton}live some distance away. { St.Kevin's}was opened in{1950}and lies within the{Bargeddie housing {scheme. Both the{minister and priest}conduct {weddings and funeral services}and call on the{sick at home and in hospital. There are about{10 to 12 weddings}in both{churches each year. Both churches have{youth associations _{Scouts, Boys Brigade,Girl Guides. There are about{600 members}in{St. {Kevin's}and{402 members}in{Bartishill.
